title: Will I get banned for LoL Client not working?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I have a picture above that shows that I'm online but its not showing that I'm online but before this I could log-on and I started a match. Well whenever I was getting into the match my screen was messed up so I closed the League and tried to reconnect from the Client but it kept saying I needed to be connected to the Internet "please check your internet connection" or something like that. And so I tried closing my client to trying restarting like that but the picture above shows why its not allowing me to do so. And keep in mind I started a match before all of this so if the game finishes while I'm not there more than likely I'll get reported for AFK and personally I'd find it not really my fault for the LoL Client not allowing me to log-in. So, lets not get me banned for something like this.

replies.body:
This is an issue we're currently investigating, and appear to be happening while trying to login while in a game.  This workaround should help resolve the issue:

PC:

Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Open "LeagueClientSettings.yaml" with notepad
Find the line:

gameflow-patcher-lock:

Delete this whole line
Save the file, restart your LoL Client - and you should be able to log in again.

If you get a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) as a result, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  I can't make any guarantees, but we'll take a look at each case individually!  We'll also be posting updates on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page!
I've realized that Riot told us that don't close your client if you're logged in luckily I logged back in and they re-made that game.
